channel.title: Comments on: Second Life Rats Us Out

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.content:encoded:
some old vietnam flick “i love you long long time”

Full Metal Jacket FTW

item.title: By: Zubon
item.dc:creator: Zubon
item.description: It's not an unreasonable outfit. It's a pretty standard dress. Yey somehow, yes, it looks sleazier than should be possible.
item.content:encoded: It’s not an unreasonable outfit. It’s a pretty standard dress. Yey somehow, yes, it looks sleazier than should be possible.

item.title: By: unbeliever
item.dc:creator: unbeliever
item.description:
The way she's dressed, that virtual world and real money tag all bring to me this image of some old vietnam flick "i love you long long time..."
But it being buisness week, naturally they'd ignore the rampant cyber sex side of 2nd life in favor of something more legit.
item.content:encoded:
The way she’s dressed, that virtual world and real money tag all bring to me this image of some old vietnam flick “i love you long long time…”

But it being buisness week, naturally they’d ignore the rampant cyber sex side of 2nd life in favor of something more legit.
